text: Devil in the Detail is a 2014 Ghanaian Nigerian romantic thriller movie directed by Shirley Frimpong-Manso and starring Nse Ikpe Etim, Adjetey Anang, Ama Ampofo, Mawuli Gavor. ==Other websites== * Category:2014 romance movies Category:2014 thriller movies Category:Ghanaian movies Category:Nigerian movies Category:Movies directed by Shirley Frimpong-Manso
title: Devil in the Detail (movie)
